description:
Join us at **Cookpad** in Bristol this month for an in-person South West Ruby meetup featuring:

🍺 food and drink (sponsored by Cookpad)
💬 talks by **Sonia Ksenija Vasjko (Cookpad)** and **Stan Lo (Shopify)**

**Schedule**

18:00 - Arrive, grab a drink and some food, have a chat

19:00 - **"Ruby on Rails Tricks" - Sonia Ksenija Vasjko**

"I’m going to talk about different Rails features that are relatively new and can improve performance or code readability. Most of this information comes from the This Week In Rails mailing list: [https://world.hey.com/this.week.in.rails](https://world.hey.com/this.week.in.rails)"

Sonia is a Web Developer at Cookpad

19:30 - **"ruby/debug - The best investment for your productivity" - Stan Lo**

"In this talk, I will demonstrate 3 powerful debugging techniques using Ruby's new debugger \`ruby/debug\`:
\- Step\-debugging
\- Frame navigation
\- Breakpoint commands

By using them together, we can reduce unnecessary context switching and make our debugging sessions more efficient."

Stan is a senior developer at Shopify and is a major contributor of the Ruby debugger. He and his teammates at the Ruby Developer Experience Team are dedicated to helping Ruby developers feel happy and productive.

20:15 - More mingling

**Slack**

If you like to join us on Slack please join https://bathruby-for-slackers.herokuapp.com and find us in the #south-west-ruby channel
title: South West Ruby #40 In Person
